data: The starship CNE Caragana slipped down out of a night sky, its gray and scarlet hull illuminated by the pale iridescence of the massive ion storms that beset space for light-years in every direction.
THE STARSHIP CNE CARAGANA slipped down out of a night sky, its gray and scarlet hull illuminated by the pale iridescence of the massive ion storms that beset space for light-years in every direction.
Peter F. Hamilton|Peter F. Hamilton (Goodreads Author)
